response.answer_text: Age is not a factor for earning money online. To make money online, you need to have a passion and a particular skill & patience. You can turn your passion into a profession by the online platform. So I am now going to tell you some easy ways to make money online. 1.Paid for searching the web Qmee.com rewards you for searching in Google, Bing, Yahoo, Amazon, and eBay. You just install a simple add-on to your browser and when you conduct a search there may be a few sponsored results alongside your normal search. Each Qmee result has a cash reward attached - if you are interested in it simply click on it and collect your reward. 2.Online surveys An increasingly popular way for students to make money is to fill out online surveys in their leisure time. Research companies are always recruiting new members worldwide to answer surveys and test new products. For a few minutes of form filling, you can make a couple of quid which is paid as cash or rewards. You can earn up to £3 ($5) for some surveys! A few good ones to try are Toluna, LifePoints, Branded Surveys, InboxPounds, OnePoll, i-Say, Opinion Outpost, YouGov, Pinecone, SurveyBods, Panel Base, Valued Opinions, The Opinion Panel, Prizerebel, Opinion Bureau, Marketagent, Survey Junkie. 3.Online market trading Today there is no need to fund the yachts of Wolf of Wall Street style stock brokers. You can do it all yourself with the help of online market trading platforms. There is a popular platform called eToro.com. eToro has over 12 million users worldwide and offers free practice accounts. 4.Start your own website: If you want to generate passive income? You need a website. It's the way to make money while you sleep. Starting a website with Bluehost takes less than 20 minutes, costs hardly anything. It only takes a bit of plugging on social media to get your first visitors, and there are plenty of ways to monetize your site. 5.Write and publish a Kindle eBook If students are good at anything, it's researching and writing. With the Amazon Kindle store, anyone can publish an eBook and make money. List your book for £1.49 - £6.99 and you earn 70% of the sale. 6.Affiliate marketing If you've got a good presence on social media or perhaps you even have a blog or website, you can start bringing in money immediately by promoting all sorts of companies, products, services, and offers online. Sign up as a publisher on the Awin networks, check their offers blog or browse the merchant listings to find something you think your friends would be interested in, grab your affiliate link and share it. If someone buys (can be within up to 90 days) using your link you'll make a nice commission. You can start your online income by following any of the above-mentioned strategies. Thank you very much.

In the internet world, there are essentially two things to consider in order to make money. Invest your time : This involves learning a skill, then sell the skill you developed in freelance sites, similar to Freelance.com, Fiver.com, upwork.com. Essentially, you want to focus on skills that don’t have lots of competition, but have high demand.Invest your money : This requires a minimum amount of money to start with (Capital). There are many business models to start in 2020. From e-commerce, and affiliate marketing to social media marketing agencies and blogging.Now let me answer your question with a straight forward response. When I was at 18, I wish somebody told me this, it could’ve simply saved me lots of time. I assume you don’t have any money to invest so, I would recommend you go learn social media marketing. Start off with the basics of marketing, and dive in to Facebook Ads and Instagram influencer marketing. I know there are many other social media marketing strategies you can learn. But, these are the basic ones. Once you learn those skills, go to the nearest coffee shop, or Restaurent in your city. Offer them your services. Build them social media following on Instagram and Facebook, boost their posts from time to time. You should be able to charge around $200 for each client. The more you build a portfolio, the easier it gets to charge more and more, $300 then $500 ..and so on and so forth. The key here is to focus all your energy, power, and time only on one thing. I really wish you the best of luck from the button of my heart. You’re only 18 y.o, you still have lots of time so use it wisely. “Don’t Do It For Money But Do It With Passion”.
